com.kroy.game

Class FireEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kroy.game.Character
      • com.kroy.game.Patrol

  • public class FireEngine
extends Patrol
    Used to handle all the info about fire engines in the game

    • Constructor Detail

      • FireEngine

        public FireEngine(int health,
                  int damage,
                  int range,
                  Tile location,
                  int speed,
                  int waterCapacity,
                  java.lang.String charTex)
        Constructs a FireEngine which is the character that a human can control Extends Character
        Parameters:
        health - the starting and max health
        damage - the amount health it removes when shooting
        range - how many tiles away it can shoot
        location - the starting location
        speed - how many tiles it can move at once
        waterCapacity - the max amount of water this engine can shoot
        charTex - the sprite root that is rendered for this character

        Increase the stored amount of water, capped by the water capacity
        Parameters:
        newAmount - the amount of water you want to add
